Package gui

Class GameFieldPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
gui.GameFieldPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class GameFieldPane extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
An pane showing the middle part of the gameScene including field and market
Author:
Wishmeluck

  • Method Details

    • MMClicked

      private void MMClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i)
      A function called when the card in monster market is clicked , setting values, setting opacity and check if the card can be chosen
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of monster card in the market that's clicked

    • SMClicked

      private void SMClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i)
      A function called when the card in Spell market is clicked , setting values, setting opacity and check if the card can be chosen
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of Spell card in the market that's clicked

    • checkEffCard

      private boolean checkEffCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i, int p, boolean m)
      Check if the card can be chose according to the effect strategy type of the card and the card chosen before
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of the card in player p hand
      p - player who own the clicked card
      m - set to true if clicked card is a monster card otherwise set to false
      Returns:
      true if the card can be clicked and false otherwise

    • EffClicked

      private void EffClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i, int p, boolean m)
      A function called when the effect card in the field clicked , setting values, setting opacity and check if the card can be chosen
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of the card in player p hand
      p - player who own the clicked card
      m - set to true if clicked card is a monster card otherwise set to false

    • FieldClicked

      private void FieldClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i, int p, boolean m)
      A function called when the card in the field clicked, it will call other functions such as AtkClicked, EffClicked, etc.
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of the card in player p hand
      p - player who own the clicked card
      m - set to true if clicked card is a monster card otherwise set to false

    • UpdStatus

      private void UpdStatus(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i, int p)
      Update monster card image showed according to its status
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of the card in player p hand
      p - player who own the clicked card

    • AtkClicked

      private void AtkClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, int i, int p)
      A function called when the effect card in the field clicked , setting values, setting opacity and check if the card can be chosen
      Parameters:
      e - a MouseEvent
      i - the index of the card in player p hand
      p - player who own the clicked card
